channel.title: CVE Feed for Bosch -- Smart Home Controller
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bosch -- Smart Home Controller

item.title: CVE-2019-11894|2024-09-17T00:46:00.989Z -- bosch -- smart%20home%20controller
item.description: A potential improper access control vulnerability exists in the backup mechanism of the Bosch Smart Home Controller (SHC) before 9.8.905 that may result in unauthorized download of a backup. In order to exploit the vulnerability, the adversary needs to download the backup directly after a backup triggered by a legitimate user has been completed.
